attributes.action: Remove car parking charges on hospital sites for NHS staff.
attributes.additional_details:
*Being penalised for being an NHS worker where other professions do not pay to park at their workplace. 
*NHS staff already provide vital contribution to society in the UK
*Many NHS staff are widely considered underpaid With pay increases below the cost of living. 
*Many hospitals are in locations poorly served and costly public transport.
attributes.background: To remove car parking charges on hospital sites to NHS staff.
